subject: Snowmobiles
X Games
Concussions
All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV)
lead_paragraph: Caleb Moore sustained a heart contusion and his brother, Colten, separated his pelvis in separate crashes in the snowmobile freestyle finals in Aspen, Colo.
snippet: Caleb Moore sustained a heart contusion and his brother, Colten, separated his pelvis in separate crashes in the snowmobile freestyle finals in Aspen, Colo.
